item.title: 2016 - Personal Choice for WebApp Development
item.description: Just a snapshot of what I use for effective & fun JS Webdevelopment right now with some overall description of application design and the libs & tools used.

item.title: Crystal LLVM IR API
item.description: Using crystals llvm bindings to create an LLVM IR for the simple addition example.

item.title: Org-Mode Powered AngularJS Boilerplate
item.description: This is my custom angular.js boilerplate Setup based on Emacs’s Org Mode and it´s impressive tangle functionality. You can load this page´s org source code in Emacs and start playing around with angular.
